params.owner: The address of the token owner.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to approve.

params.decimals_: The number of decimals for the token.

params.subtractedValue: The amount to reduce from the approved allowance.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to transfer.
The amount of tokens to transfer.
params.recipient: The address of the token recipient.
params.sender: The address of the token sender.

allowance(address,address).notice: Returns the remaining tokens a spender is allowed to spend on behalf of the owner.

approve(address,uint256).notice: Approves a spender to transfer up to a specific amount of tokens on behalf of the caller.

balanceOf(address).notice: Returns the balance of a specific account.

decimals().notice: Returns the number of decimals used by the token.

decreaseAllowance(address,uint256).notice: Decreases the allowance for a spender.

increaseAllowance(address,uint256).notice: Increases the allowance for a spender.

name().notice: Returns the name of the token.

symbol().notice: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupply().notice: Returns the total supply of the token.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: Transfers tokens on behalf of the owner to a recipient.
